title: Ticket #2897: Flesh out OTEST_condor_sockaddr.cpp
description: The start of a unit test test for condor_sockaddr was started in /src/condor_unit_tests/OTEST_condor_sockaddr.cpp but only tests a few functions, especially those related to a bug I was investigating. More of the object should be tested, ideally as much as possible.
